[Cross posted from my Urban Vancouver blog]

I believe the translation of the above title is The BC Blogosphere is connected! Thanks to Cécile Lepage for interviewing me for the 22-28 August 2005 edition of L'Express du Pacifique, Vancouver's French language weekly. You gals and guys who are expressing yourselves online in the brave new Web 2.0 conversational Internet on your Live Journals, Bryght sites, Blogware blogs, Blogger sites, TypePad sites, etc. are the ones who should get credit. True, blog pied pipers like Darren Barefoot, Brian Lamb, and myself have helped some of you start on your "expression journey on the web" but in the end it's what you do that matters!
